nodes.text: Indigo Studios, founded in 1996 by Marc Rochon, is a visual arts and graphics company that produces creative marketing material catering to a wide variety of clients. Indigo Studios employs modelers, editors, retouch artists, designers, computer-generated imagery and computer graphics artists, photographers, producers, illustrators, and sales representatives that each specialize in different areas of the services offer to their clients. The studio has produced artwork for such clients as Hasbro and Lucasfilm, including promotional imagery for Star Wars-themed toys and cover art for Blu-Ray editions of the films.
